name: velocity.vim
description: velocity.vim adds syntax highlighting for velocity templates, a template engine for Java from the Jakarta Project (http://jakarta.apache.org/velocity).
install_details:
Copy the velocity.vim file into your ~/.vim/syntax/ directory, and add the following to you ~/.vim/filetype.vim file, inside the "augroup filedetect" block:

au! BufRead,BufNewFile *.vm  setfiletype velocity


For details about adding syntax highlighting support for new file types, read the help at  |:h mysyntaxfile<CR>| and |:h new-filetype<CR>| .

versions.release_notes: Fixed the velocity reference syntax highlighting rule. Thanks to Philippe Paravicini <philippe.paravicini@datalex.com>.
more complete version, based on the VTL Refernce guide at http://jakarta.apache.org/velocity/vtl-reference-guide.html
